summary: The myths of the sixties are satirized in 20 episodes.
cast: Ugo Tognazzi|Vittorio Gassman|Lando Buzzanca|Marino Masé|Marisa Merlini|Rika Dialyna|Michèle Mercier|Ricky Tognazzi|Franco Castellani|Maria Mannelli|Mario Laurentino|Angela Portaluri|Carlo Kechler|Ugo Attanasio|Luciana Vincenzi|Carlo Bagno|Daniele Vargas|Françoise Leroy|Sal Borgese|Maria Luisa Rispoli|Riccardo Paladini|Mario Brega|Nino Nini|Ottavio Panunzi|Lucia Modugno|Anna Lina Alberti|Franco Caracciolo|Mario Cecchi Gori|Rosemary Dexter|Thea Fleming|Mario Frera|Veriano Ginesi|Jacques Herlin|Elisa Mainardi|Pat O'Hara|Quinto Parmeggiani|Carmen Pericolo|Jean Rougeul|Yacinto Yaria
title: Monstruos de hoy
